hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Preparing tmp=/tmp/jenkins/${JOB_NAME} mkdir -p $tmp
# ENV URL=https://cdn.subutai.io:8338/kurjun/rest filename="management-stable.deb"
# get current file id function jsonval { temp=`echo $json | sed 's/\\\\\//\//g' | sed 's/[{}]//g' | awk -v k="text" '{n=split($0,a,","); for (i=1; i<=n; i++) print a[i]}' | sed 's/\"\:\"/\|/g' | sed 's/[\,]/ /g' | sed 's/\"//g' | grep -w $prop` echo ${temp##*|} }
json=`curl -k -s -X GET $URL/apt/info?name=$filename` prop='id' id=`jsonval`
cd management
# build deb mvn clean install -Dmaven.test.skip=true -P deb -Dgit.branch=stable
# move builded file #mv `ls server/server-karaf/target/*.deb` $tmp/$filename find server/server-karaf/target/ -name "*.deb" | xargs -I {} mv {} $tmp/$filename
#preparing data for uploader echo "file=$tmp/$filename" > ../env.properties echo "id=$id" >> ../env.properties echo "dir=apt" >> ../env.properties

set +x URL=https://eu0.cdn.subutai.io:8338/kurjun/rest USER=jenkins AUTHID=$(curl -s -k "$URL/auth/token?user=$USER" | gpg --clearsign --no-tty) token=$(curl -s -k -Fmessage="$AUTHID" -Fuser=$USER "$URL/auth/token")
curl -s -k -Ffile=@$file -H "token:$token" "$URL/$dir/upload" curl -k -H "token: ${token}" "https://${URL}/apt/generate" # delete old file curl -s -k -X DELETE "$URL/apt/delete?id=$id&token=$token"

# Preparing tmp=/tmp/jenkins/${JOB_NAME} mkdir -p $tmp cdnHost=cdn.subutai.io
# ENV URL=https://cdn.subutai.io:8338/kurjun/rest version=$(/var/lib/jenkins/.opt/xidel -s management/pom.xml -e "<project><parent></parent><version>{.}" | cut -d '-' -f1) templatefilename="management-subutai-template_${version}_amd64.tar.gz" filename="management-stable.deb" # get current file id function jsonval { temp=`echo $json | sed 's/\\\\\//\//g' | sed 's/[{}]//g' | awk -v k="text" '{n=split($0,a,","); for (i=1; i<=n; i++) print a[i]}' | sed 's/\"\:\"/\|/g' | sed 's/[\,]/ /g' | sed 's/\"//g' | grep -w $prop` echo ${temp##*|} }
json=`curl -k -s -X GET $URL/template/info?name=$templatefilename` prop='id' id=`jsonval`
# build template ssh root@172.31.11.37 <<- EOF set -x subutai destroy management subutai import debian-stretch subutai clone debian-stretch management /bin/sleep 20 scp root@172.31.5.61:/mnt/lib/lxc/jenkins/rootfs/$tmp/${filename} /var/snap/subutai-dev/common/lxc/management/rootfs/tmp/ subutai attach management "apt-get update && apt-get install dirmngr -y" subutai attach management "gpg --keyserver pgp.mit.edu --recv 80260C65A4D79BC8" subutai attach management "gpg --export --armor 80260C65A4D79BC8 | apt-key add" subutai attach management "echo 'deb http://${cdnHost}:8080/kurjun/rest/apt /' > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/subutai-repo.list" subutai attach management "apt-get update" subutai attach management "sync" subutai attach management "apt-get -y install curl influxdb influxdb-certs openjdk-8-jre" subutai attach management "wget --no-check-certificate -q 'https://${cdnHost}:8338/kurjun/rest/raw/get?owner=subutai&name=influxdb.conf' -O /etc/influxdb/influxdb.conf" subutai attach management "dpkg -i /tmp/${filename}" subutai attach management "systemctl stop management" subutai attach management "rm -rf /opt/subutai-mng/keystores/" subutai attach management "apt-get clean" subutai attach management "sync" rm /var/snap/subutai-dev/common/lxc/management/rootfs/tmp/${filename} subutai export management -v ${version} scp /var/snap/subutai-dev/common/lxc/tmpdir/management-subutai-template_${version}_amd64.tar.gz root@172.31.5.61:/mnt/lib/lxc/jenkins/rootfs/$tmp/$templatefilename EOF
# move template to jenkins instance #ssh root@gw.intra.lan "mv /mnt/lib/lxc/tmpdir/management-subutai-template_${version}_amd64.tar.gz /mnt/lib/lxc/jenkins/rootfs/$tmp/$filename"
#preparing data for uploader echo "file=$tmp/$templatefilename" > env.properties echo "id=$id" >> env.properties echo "dir=template" >> env.properties

set +x URL=https://eu0.cdn.subutai.io:8338/kurjun/rest USER=jenkins AUTHID=$(curl -s -k "$URL/auth/token?user=$USER" | gpg --clearsign --no-tty) token=$(curl -s -k -Fmessage="$AUTHID" -Fuser=$USER "$URL/auth/token")
#curl -s -k -Ffile=@$file -Ftoken=$token "$URL/$dir/upload" SIGNATURE=$(curl -s -k -Ffile=@$file -H "token:$token" "$URL/template/upload" | gpg --clearsign --no-tty) curl -s -k -Ftoken="$token" -Fsignature="$SIGNATURE" "$URL/auth/sign"
# delete old file curl -s -k -X DELETE "$URL/template/delete?id=$id&token=$token"
